Package TimeConverter

Class ConvertTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • TimeConverter.ConvertTime
  • public class ConvertTime
extends java.lang.Object
    The ConvertTime class hold multiple public methods that can be used to convert times.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConvertTime()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.time.LocalDateTime dateTimeToGMT​(java.time.LocalDateTime selectedDateTime)  
      static java.time.LocalTime endTimeToGMT​(java.lang.String endTime, java.time.LocalDate endDate)
      The endTimeToGMT method returns a LocalTime in GMT when given a endtime in the form of a formatted string and a LocalDate the appointment will end on.
      static java.time.LocalTime getEndESTTime​(java.lang.String endTime, java.time.LocalDate endDate)
      The getEndESTTime method returns a LocalTime in EST when given a endTime in the form of a string and a LocalDate.
      static java.time.ZonedDateTime getEndTimeZoned​(java.lang.String endTime, java.time.LocalDate endDate)
      The getEndTimeZoned method returns a ZonedDateTime when given a time in the form of a string and a LocalDate.
      static java.sql.Timestamp getLocalDateTimeFromDataBase​(java.sql.Timestamp timeStampFromDataBase)
      The getLocalDateTimeFromDataBase method returns a timestamp converted from UTC time to the local zone time.
      static java.time.LocalTime getStartESTTime​(java.lang.String startTime, java.time.LocalDate startDate)
      The getStartESTTime method returns a localtime when given a starttime in the form of a formatted string and a localDate the appointment will start on.
      static java.time.ZonedDateTime getStartTimeZoned​(java.lang.String startTime, java.time.LocalDate startDate)
      The getStartTimeZoned returns a zonedDateTime when given a start time in the form of a formatted string and a localDate the appointment will start on.
      static java.lang.String getTimeForUser​(java.time.LocalTime myTime)
      The getTimeForUser method converts a localTime object to a string in the format i want to display it in.
      static boolean hoursOfOperation​(java.lang.String startTime, java.lang.String endTime, java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate)
      The hoursOfOperation method returns false if the start or end time of the appointment is outside of the hours of operation else it returns true.
      static java.time.LocalTime startTimeToGMT​(java.lang.String startTime, java.time.LocalDate startDate)
      The startTimeToGMT method returns a LocalTime in GMT when given a startTime in the form of a formatted string and a LocalDate the appointment starts on.

        public static java.time.ZonedDateTime getEndTimeZoned​(java.lang.String endTime,
                                                      java.time.LocalDate endDate)
        The getEndTimeZoned method returns a ZonedDateTime when given a time in the form of a string and a LocalDate.
        Parameters:
        endTime - String of time the appointment will end
        endDate - LocalDate the appointment will end on

      • getEndESTTime

        public static java.time.LocalTime getEndESTTime​(java.lang.String endTime,
                                                java.time.LocalDate endDate)
        The getEndESTTime method returns a LocalTime in EST when given a endTime in the form of a string and a LocalDate.
        Parameters:
        endDate - LocalDate of when the appointment will end.
        endTime - time the appointment will end in the form of a formatted string.

      • endTimeToGMT

        public static java.time.LocalTime endTimeToGMT​(java.lang.String endTime,
                                               java.time.LocalDate endDate)
        The endTimeToGMT method returns a LocalTime in GMT when given a endtime in the form of a formatted string and a LocalDate the appointment will end on.
        Parameters:
        endDate - LocalDate of when the appointment will end.
        endTime - time the appointment will end in the form of a formatted string.

      • getStartTimeZoned

        public static java.time.ZonedDateTime getStartTimeZoned​(java.lang.String startTime,
                                                        java.time.LocalDate startDate)
        The getStartTimeZoned returns a zonedDateTime when given a start time in the form of a formatted string and a localDate the appointment will start on.
        Parameters:
        startDate - start date of the appointment
        startTime - start time in the form of a formatted string

        public static java.time.LocalTime startTimeToGMT​(java.lang.String startTime,
                                                 java.time.LocalDate startDate)
        The startTimeToGMT method returns a LocalTime in GMT when given a startTime in the form of a formatted string and a LocalDate the appointment starts on.
        Parameters:
        startDate - start date of the appointment
        startTime - start time in the form of a formatted string

      • hoursOfOperation

        public static boolean hoursOfOperation​(java.lang.String startTime,
                                       java.lang.String endTime,
                                       java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                       java.time.LocalDate endDate)
        The hoursOfOperation method returns false if the start or end time of the appointment is outside of the hours of operation else it returns true.
        Parameters:
        startTime - start time from combo box
        startDate - start date from start date picker
        endTime - end time from combo box
        endDate - end date from end date picker

      • getLocalDateTimeFromDataBase

        public static java.sql.Timestamp getLocalDateTimeFromDataBase​(java.sql.Timestamp timeStampFromDataBase)
        The getLocalDateTimeFromDataBase method returns a timestamp converted from UTC time to the local zone time. This method will be used to convert date and time for display in in the program.
        Parameters:
        timeStampFromDataBase - the timestamp saved in the data base.

      • getTimeForUser

        public static java.lang.String getTimeForUser​(java.time.LocalTime myTime)
        The getTimeForUser method converts a localTime object to a string in the format i want to display it in.
